column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Food: Came here for a reunion dinner
column2: I was actually feeling a bit under the weather (warning TMI - I had some...GI issues). But I'm glad I came here for some ramen. The noodles delicious broth helped nurture me back to health and I felt GREAT the next morning. I asked the waitress what I should get given how I felt and she recommended the Tokyo Yatai Ramen
column3: combination of pork and chicken. Good portion and delicious combination of the vegetables
column5: and tender meat really hit the spot.
